pages.title: Weapons & Combat Tools
pages.text: Hexalia’s arms favor control and clever timing—sustaining the wielder while hindering foes.

pages.title: Kelpweave Blade
pages.text: A sword braided from enchanted kelp. On hit, slows targets. Slowly mends itself when the wielder is in rain or water.

pages.title: Purifying Sac
pages.text: Thrown while sneaking to burst into a cleansing cloud that removes negative effects. Can also be used directly to purify yourself.

pages.title: Foul Sac
pages.text: A toxic projectile that releases a poisonous miasma, dealing damage and inflicting Poison II and Slowness II to enemies in the area.

pages.title: Frost Sac
pages.text: Explodes into freezing vapors that inflict Weakness II and briefly immobilize foes—ideal for crowd control.
